description: Tarot cards are consumables based on Major Arcana that can enhance cards, convert suits, provide money, or create other cards.
source: Arcana Packs, Purple Seal, the Shop

cards.effect_en: Creates the last Tarot or Planet card used during this run (The Fool excluded)
cards.effect_zh: 創造本局使用過的最後一張塔羅牌或星球牌（愚者除外）

cards.effect_en: Enhances 2 selected cards to Lucky Cards
cards.effect_zh: 將 2 張選擇的牌強化為幸運牌

cards.effect_en: Creates up to 2 random Planet cards (Must have room)
cards.effect_zh: 創造最多 2 張隨機星球牌（需有空間）

cards.effect_en: Enhances 2 selected cards to Mult Cards
cards.effect_zh: 將 2 張選擇的牌強化為倍率牌

cards.effect_en: Creates up to 2 random Tarot cards (Must have room)
cards.effect_zh: 創造最多 2 張隨機塔羅牌（需有空間）

cards.effect_en: Enhances 2 selected cards to Bonus Cards
cards.effect_zh: 將 2 張選擇的牌強化為獎勵牌

cards.effect_en: Enhances 1 selected card into a Wild Card
cards.effect_zh: 將 1 張選擇的牌強化為百搭牌

cards.effect_en: Enhances 1 selected card into a Steel Card
cards.effect_zh: 將 1 張選擇的牌強化為鋼鐵牌

cards.effect_en: Enhances 1 selected card into a Glass Card
cards.effect_zh: 將 1 張選擇的牌強化為玻璃牌

cards.effect_en: Doubles money (Max of $20)
cards.effect_zh: 金錢翻倍（最多 $20）

cards.effect_en: 1 in 4 chance to add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome edition to a random Joker
cards.effect_zh: 1/4 機率為隨機小丑加上閃卡、全息或幻彩版本

cards.effect_en: Increases rank of up to 2 selected cards by 1
cards.effect_zh: 將最多 2 張選擇的牌點數提升 1

cards.effect_en: Destroys up to 2 selected cards
cards.effect_zh: 銷毀最多 2 張選擇的牌

cards.effect_en: Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card (Drag to rearrange)
cards.effect_zh: 選擇 2 張牌，將左邊的牌轉換為右邊的牌（可拖曳調整順序）

cards.effect_en: Gives the total sell value of all current Jokers (Max of $50)
cards.effect_zh: 獲得所有目前小丑的總售價（最多 $50）

cards.effect_en: Enhances 1 selected card into a Gold Card
cards.effect_zh: 將 1 張選擇的牌強化為黃金牌

cards.effect_en: Enhances 1 selected card into a Stone Card
cards.effect_zh: 將 1 張選擇的牌強化為石頭牌

cards.effect_en: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Diamonds
cards.effect_zh: 將最多 3 張選擇的牌轉換為方塊

cards.effect_en: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Clubs
cards.effect_zh: 將最多 3 張選擇的牌轉換為梅花

cards.effect_en: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Hearts
cards.effect_zh: 將最多 3 張選擇的牌轉換為紅心

cards.effect_en: Creates a random Joker card (Must have room)
cards.effect_zh: 創造一張隨機小丑牌（需有空間）

cards.effect_en: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Spades
cards.effect_zh: 將最多 3 張選擇的牌轉換為黑桃

notes: All 22 Tarot cards are based on the Major Arcana
Can be obtained from Arcana Packs, Purple Seal cards, or the Shop
Jokers like Cartomancer, 8 Ball, Superposition, Vagabond, and Hallucination can also produce Tarot cards
Vouchers 'Tarot Merchant' and 'Tarot Tycoon' affect Tarot card availability in the Shop
